channel.title: Crypto News - SosoValue Research
channel.description: Latest crypto news from SosoValue Research

item.title: Hong Kong Customs busts a money laundering case suspected of using stablecoins, involving approximately HKD 1.15B.Hong Kong Customs today cracked a money laundering case suspected of using smuggled cash and virtual assets, involving approximately 1.15B yuan, and arrested a local man and a non-local man. It is reported that Hong Kong Customs officers identified a 37-year-old local man and a 50-year-old non-local man and launched a wealth investigation. They found that the two smuggled cash out of the country and frequently and rapidly conducted huge amounts of stablecoin and fiat currency transactions with funds of unknown origin, which was extremely inconsistent with their background and financial situation, and were suspected of engaging in money laundering activities. During the operation, customs officers seized a batch of suspected items, including mobile phones, tablets and bank cards. The case is still under investigation, and the two arrested persons are currently released on bail pending investigation, and it is not ruled out that more people will be arrested. (Sing Tao Daily) [Odaily News]

item.title: US State Department: US will withdraw from UNESCOOn July 22, the US State Department said the US will withdraw from UNESCO. US Treasury Secretary Benson said there is no indication that Powell should resign now. If he wants to leave early, he should do so. [PANews]
item.description: 13 minutes agoPANewsUS State Department: US will withdraw from UNESCOOn July 22, the US State Department said the US will withdraw from UNESCO. item.title: Soluna Holdings Completes $20.00M Financing Round with Participation from Spring Lane CapitalNasdaq-listed Soluna Holdings, which develops green data centers for intensive computing applications such as Bitcoin mining and artificial intelligence, has announced the completion of a new $20.00M funding round with participation from Spring Lane Capital. The new funds are intended to expand its Kati green data center project in Texas to further expand its Bitcoin hosting business. [Foresight News]

[PANews]

item.title: Japanese textile company Kitabo plans to purchase approximately $5.40M worth of BitcoinAccording to the official announcement, Japanese textile materials company Kitabo Co has announced the official launch of its Bitcoin purchase plan. The company has been approved by the shareholders' meeting to purchase Bitcoin in batches through Japanese crypto asset exchanges using a dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy with a maximum of 800.00 million yen (approximately $5.43 million USD), and plans to use some of it for lending business to obtain stable income. Kitabo stated that it will position Bitcoin as the basic asset for carrying out cross-border services and diversified business strategies in the future. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Nano Labs Increases BNB Strategic Reserve to $90.00M, Plans to Upgrade Reserve StrategyWeb 3.0 infrastructure and product solution provider Nano Labs Ltd (Nasdaq: NA) announced that the company has significantly increased its BNB holdings to 120,000, with a current total value of approximately $90.00M. Recently, Nano Labs added 45,684.9862 BNB through over-the-counter transactions, with an average purchase price of approximately $764 per BNB. Currently, the company's average purchase cost of BNB is $707. Nano Labs stated that it will further strengthen its BNB strategic reserve in the future through various methods such as continuously increasing its BNB holdings, acquiring controlling stakes in entities with BNB as a core reserve asset, and investing in companies focused on holding BNB. (Globe Newswire) [Odaily News]

item.title: Hut 8 Announces Subsidiary Receives Dubai DIFC License to Explore Derivatives MarketNasdaq-listed BTC mining company Hut 8 announced that its subsidiary, Hut 8 Investment Ltd, has obtained a commercial license from the Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC), authorizing it to conduct proprietary investment and other commercial activities under the legal and regulatory framework of the DIFC based on international standards and common law principles, including direct access to global derivatives markets and access to institutional-grade products and counterparties. It is reported that Hut 8 is the main shareholder of American Bitcoin, a cryptocurrency company supported by Eric Trump, son of former U.S. President Donald Trump, and has previously transferred its mining equipment to American Bitcoin in exchange for 80% of the equity. (Globenewswire) [Odaily]

item.title: Nano Labs Increases Holdings by 45,684 BNB via OTC, Approximately $34.90MU.S. listed company Nano Labs Ltd (Nasdaq: NA) today announced that its BNB holdings have significantly increased to 120,000, with a current total value of approximately $90.00M. Nano Labs has newly purchased 45,684.9862 BNB through over-the-counter (OTC) transactions, with an average purchase price of approximately $764.00 per BNB. As of now, the company holds a total of approximately 120,000 BNB, with an average purchase cost of $707.00 per BNB and a current market value of approximately $90.00M. [Foresight News]

item.title: Glassnode: Bitcoin dominance drops 2.98 percentage points in one week, funds are flowing into altcoinsGlassnode posted on X that Bitcoin's market capitalization dominance fell from 63.76% to 60.78% over the past week, a drop of 2.98 percentage points, one of the largest single-week declines this year, with funds flowing into altcoins. [Foresight News]

item.title: The second phase of the Gate "Red Bull Racing Tour" is in full swing, with transaction volume exceeding $10.00B and more than 21,000 participantsOn July 22, according to official news, the second phase of the "Red Bull Racing Tour" launched by Gate on July 12 has continued to gain popularity. Before the deadline, the total transaction volume has exceeded $10.00B, the number of participants has exceeded 21,000, and 1,000 GT rewards have been successfully unlocked. The total prize pool for this phase is as high as 20,000 GT. Participants can impact the rankings by completing spot and contract tasks, and not only have the opportunity to share generous rewards, but also have the opportunity to win tickets to watch the F1 Grand Prix worth tens of thousands of dollars. Join the Red Bull Racing Tour now to start a speed feast where the world of crypto meets the passion of top racing, and chase the peak of glory together. [PANews]

item.title: Multi-chain wallet TokenPocket now supports using USDD to pay transaction feesMulti-chain self-custody wallet TokenPocket announced that after previously adding support for USDT as a transfer "network fee" on TRON, it now supports the decentralized stablecoin USDD as a Gas Fee payment method. When users transfer via the TRON network, they can directly use USDD to pay transaction fees and enjoy limited-time transaction fee subsidies, achieving "more savings with every transaction." Currently, TokenPocket serves over 25.00 million users worldwide, with over 3.50 million monthly active users, and its business covers more than 200 countries and regions. The new support for USDD to pay transaction fees will inevitably further enrich the application scenarios of USDD 2.0. [Odaily]

item.title: Archax Acquires German Digital Asset Firm DDA to Expand European Crypto ETP FootprintUK-based digital asset exchange Archax will acquire Deutsche Digital Assets (DDA), a regulated German crypto asset management company, to strengthen its business presence in major European financial markets such as the UK, Germany, and France. DDA currently manages approximately $70.00M in assets and focuses on distributing crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs) through European banks and asset management institutions. This acquisition will bring new licenses to Archax, including portfolio management and investment advisory under German BaFin regulation, enabling it to better serve EU institutional clients. (CoinDesk) [Odaily]

item.title: Strategy Announces Proposed Initial Public Offering of STRC SharesStrategy (NASDAQ: MSTR , STRK , STRF , STRD ) announced plans to issue 5,000,000 shares of variable rate Series A perpetual extended preferred stock ( STRC stock) and conduct an initial public offering, subject to market and other conditions. The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including Bitcoin acquisitions and working capital. The initial annualized monthly dividend rate for STRC stock is 9.00% , and the company has the right to adjust the dividend rate in accordance with relevant regulations. Morgan Stanley, Barclays, Moelis & Company and TD Securities serve as joint bookrunners for this offering. The offering will be made through an effective registration statement with the SEC and will be sold only by prospectus. [PANews]

item.title: Glassnode: Ethereum buyers took profits near $2,520.00, but still hold nearly 2.00M ETHA heatmap of Ethereum's cost basis distribution released by blockchain data analysis firm Glassnode shows that since July 1, buyers have been taking profits significantly around $2,520.00, and the red area is gradually weakening. However, these buyers still hold nearly 2.00M ETH. [Foresight News]
